research_municipality_step.notes: Information on elected officials for Anthony town, TX, was gathered from the Texas Municipal League City Officials Directory and the Texas State Directory Online. While some recent news reports from May 2025 indicated an election where former mayor Martin Lerma was leading against incumbent Anthony Turner, the official directories list Martin Lerma as the current Mayor. The role of Mayor Pro Tem and specific council seats were also identified from these sources.

office.name: Council Member - Mayor Pro Tempore - Seat 3
